food.title: Singapore Chilli Crab
food.description: Deeply complex, mildly spicy, with a perfect balance of sweet and savoury, this stuff is the Mother Of All Flavour Bombs.

food.title: Cprispy Baby Squid
food.description: Soft juicy center, crispy outside, a crispy mouthful of ocean delight.

food.title: Red Bean Soup with Mochi (Shiratama Dango)
food.description: Red bean soup is a Japanese dessert with soft and chewy mochi served with cooked and sweetened red bean (azuki bean) soup

food.title: Nasi lemak
food.description: Malaysian coconut milk rice, served with sambal, fried crispy anchovies, toasted peanuts and cucumber.
